评论详情: Based off the measurements provided it should’ve been a perfect fit, but it was too small. It was wrinkly when it arrived but nothing that wouldn’t have been fixed by washing it and steaming it. Good fabric quality, maybe a little see through. It would’ve been a good dress had it not been small
Super cute and extremely comfortable! I’m on the shorter side so it went a little past my ankles. The strings were a little too long, but I plan on trimming them a bit to fit better.
Cute not big boob friendly unless you’re okay with them showing off. No wrinkles, not much air flow, one layer of fabric but not see through, zipper held up not stretchy at all.
The dress runs small so swallow your pride and size up. It will be worth it! I feel so pretty and feminine wearing this dress🩷
hideous cheap material. Is not flattering once worn.

评论详情: Love this dress! It’s a little too big for me in the chest but looks nice. I would maybe order a size down

Fabric is extremely cheap and see through, fit is not flattering, no structure, the lining only runs to halfway down the skirt and is see through even with a lining. Can’t believe they are charging this much for this dress.

I’m so disappointed. I’ve been obsessed with this dress all year, and was so excited when my husband gave me two of them in different patterns for Christmas. Until I opened the sleeves the dresses were packaged in. The material feels like that cheap slippery plastic hotel shower curtains are made out of, and I’m sending them back. For the price, I definitely expected higher quality fabric. Overall quality is like something from Spirit Halloween. Unless you are looking for a costume, don’t bother.

Sized down a size from what the measurement chart put me at because I wanted it tight around the upper torso and it's adjustable. You can see I still had it all the way tightened after sizing down. Nice lightweight fabric for hot days.
The dress isn’t like the one advertised.
Tela y diseño lindo, fue muy admirado.

To be honest I loved this dress, I’m 5’11 about 280 LBS, to be honest with you, this dress is for woman who have a slimmer waist and smaller boobs. I’d also like to put out there for you ladies, we all go through it, I don’t have huge wings but I have wings, and I ended up having to cut the dress off due to the top half of the dress getting stuck. The material is perfect, quality is great. For wrinkles make sure you steam it if possible. Mine came with wrinkles. The weight of the dress is very light, it’s very flowy. The zipper is perfect because it really can get you in there if you tried, it doesn’t go anywhere and it’s really sturdy. I got mine in the color of black, mine was not see through at all, I tried it on without a bra or underwear and was perfectly fine.  Overall, if I could fit the dress I bought, which was the biggest size, I would’ve given it a 8/10, the dress is also very long. Quality id give an 8/10 also.
Fit perfect

The dress arrived early then anticipated but and it is a big but it came dirty with white satains and smelly. But it’s not fabric smelly from production it’s smelly like someone wore it and sweat in it and didn’t wear any deodorant. Horrible! And it’s really saddening beacause I really like that dress..

I wish I got a bigger size but there weren’t any left. It was such a beautiful dress. So form-fitting and sexy. I was scared the shoulders would be too poofy but they were perfect. And the neckline was stunning!
This dress was just what I was looking for. Perfect fit. True to size. Material is a little see through but mainly only a problem if you get a light color. Wrinkles come out very easily
The material is a bit thin but not cheap or see through. It was the perfect date night dress.
This one was way too large on me, the sleeves would not stay up. I have a so I didn’t think I would have the same problem as the other reviews had, but it didn’t hold up on me unfortunately.
Brighter pink than I expected but fits great and ended up being perfect for my baby shower!

Better than expected. Lined. Definitely a buy.

Light and flowy, Easy to iron and doesn’t wrinkle easily. Beautiful feminine fit, hugs your curves at the right places. I bought a size small and I am 5’5 115lbs 34-B. Fits perfectly, although I would have liked it a little longer but it sits above my ankles.

评论用户: Didn’t hold air.  Glad I didn’t fill it up with water because it totally deflated overnight.
评论详情: I have never written a review before but had to say that this dress did not disappoint!  I wanted a rose-patterned dress for my trip to Paris (40th bday) and it was so beautiful in pictures.  I wish the material was a little softer but it was great for the structure and shape so I was pleasantly surprised.  I received so many compliments on this dress!  This is a size large (medium was sold out!) and it still worked out well enough.  I am 5’5”, 138lbs.  Also, the wrinkles were easy to quickly steam, straight out of my suitcase.
This dress is soooooo nice and it gives you such a nice waist snug! Sooo sexy!
Super cheap material not worth the price. Two stars because it fits true to size.

I used fashion tape to keep the sleeves on my shoulders  Edit: I forgot to mention I’m 5”3 and this dress covered my feet so I hemmed it up 3 inches.

评论概述: Beautiful dress just not for busty girlies imo
评论详情: It was a beautiful dress but it did for my boobs okay. I am a size medium/large because of my boobs. I am a 38-DDD…. My nipples would do the occasional slip out/show off.
Dress was very comfortable and elegant. My boyfriend went nuts over me in it.

First, two great things stand out: the gentle yellow color and elastic detailing around the chest are beautiful. Two issues caused me to return this dress, however: 1) the (very) puffy sleeves were too tight at the bands around the upper arms and 2) there is an underskirt, which is much shorter than the floor-length dress, is visible because the fabric is so thin. If these issues were addressed, I would say this dress would be a great summer dress.
Everything I was looking for! I wore the front ties a bit different because I’m bustier but everyone loved it! Go ahead and buy it! It’s totally worth the money!
Cute and would be pretty but material was kind of cheap. Also way bigger than size chart led on.
I love this dress for date night. However the titties will be titting, if your chesty. So be prepared.
I really wanted this dress to work.  It fit true to size every where but the chest.  I’m a 36D and it was really really big.  Nice fabric and I don’t think it would show wrinkles once pressed.
Runs small I would suggest sizing up. Besides that I thought it was super cute the husband thought I looked amish and now has fantasies about this dress. Proceed with caution!
I wore this for my engagement photos and I felt so beautiful in it. I’m 5’3 and it wasn’t too long. The Large size was accurate and I liked how it fit.

I returned my original purchase and got the largest size instead. It fits me comfortably and I am a US 16 XL usually.  The bust was slightly large on me (c cup), so it is definitely large bust friendly. The fitted top with flowy bottom combo is flattering to my pear shaped body. You can tie the front ties in a bow or around your neck in multiple styles. You can wear the sleeves down or up, but they do occasionally slip down if worn on the shoulders. The slit is on the left and is not super high. It has a back zipper . The material feels dressy, it was perfect to wear as a wedding guest. I got compliments on it. I will probably get other colors in the future  .
I was pleasantly surprised with how high quality this dress was! It's like a disney princess dress and will be a new closet staple for me.

The dress is beautiful. I would recommend only wearing it with the sleeves off shoulder as they are way too wide for it to look good on your shoulder. The sleeves were also sewn improperly, so there was weird folding on them thay made them not sit flat at the cuff and bulge out from underneath.
I loved the dress. It unfortunately didn’t fit me but that was a my bad on my part. I ended up having to use another dress because a replacement wouldn’t have made it in time. The style is beautiful
great for a wedding guest dress

It’s a beautiful dress, I’ve returned it and got me a bigger size

I decided to purchase this dress for a baby shower and it did not disappoint. The material was light but not see-through. Beware, it has no stretch what so ever. I’m 5’8, im a DD and I weigh 217. I usually wear a size XL, because it has no stretch I purchased a size up XXL. The issues I had were the sleeves are a bit big so they kept falling off and it doesn’t have much coverage for big boobs which you see in the pics.

I love this dress. I bought it last year when I was an XS, and this year, I’m an S, and it still fits perfectly. I get so many compliments on it every time I wear it. The material on the skirt feels a bit heavier than expected, so when it’s over 100 degrees here in AZ, it can feel a bit hot, but besides that, it’s one of my favorite go-to dresses for work and for hanging out.
This product is STUNNING! I wore these for my engagement pictures and it fit like a glove and was super comfy!
Perfect in every way
It was very cute style, material very sheer I would recommend a slip under, any shapwear might show thru I ordered medium and it was a bit too tight, needed next size up 5' 2" 130 pnds

10/10 a MUST buy! Looks so great, I feel sexy in it. Really nice stretchy thick fabric, super flowy and lose up top (for obvious reasons lol). And you can style it in many ways if you wish! It arrived super wrinkly so make sure you iron it before wearing it. Also buy a size up if you're not sure! It is super tight on the arms like others are saying, but there IS a slip under it where the slit ends even if it is thin. Also the zipper can be a struggle at times but be patient. Regardless, it's a great dress and a must buy for other small chested girlie's :)

It’s a very cute dress and it’s thin so perfect for summer. However, I got the same style and size in another color from another seller and this one was very tight around the rib cage area compared to that one. The tightness would make it gather up and I had to keep pulling it down throughout the night.

This dress fit me pretty well, however, once I doctored it a bit, it fit me amazingly well! All I did was safety pin some of the fabric to itself - from the outer, upper breast to underneath the armpit. I did use a nude, sticky bra and pull the girls together. It looked fine braless, but I wanted the look of a little more support. I bought a size L which is my normal size. I'm 5'7½" and weight between 162-167lbs. My measurements are 31" waist, 41" hips, 34D/36C, but my love handles are almost as wide as my hips and I still felt super good in this dress. The arm holes are a little tight, but not distractingly so. Before wearing it, I handwashed it, hung it to dry, and steamed it to get the wrinkles out. This brought the dress to another level. I want this dress in every color, but don't have enough occasions to warrant buying them all. 😅 Get the dress, you won't regret it!!!
Too small doesn't fit - not correct size

I am 5’6” 152lbs and purchased a size large. Fits perfectly and so feminine. I feel so beautiful. This white with blue flowers gives such a sassy country girl vibe. I’ve paired with ankle cowgirl boots. I’m going to buy the red one and wear while in Las Vegas.
I have worn this dress 3 times now and get tons of compliement.  I even overheard a woman say to the man she "what a beautiful dress."  I love the slit up the side. I bought the light blue one.

Love this. Very comfortable and good quality. Beautiful flow

Wore this in Italy and it was very pretty. Like others have said, it doesn't have any stretch though and the quality of the fabric isn't great. THe fit was very flattering though and the color was true to photos.

This dress was so close to perfect that I tried it on 5 times before I gave up and returned it. It’s beautiful in person and fabric is unlike any dress I’ve had before- it’s thicker but super soft and almost satin-like. My husband LOVED the fit and style of this dress. The only reason it didn’t quite work is the bust area didn’t quite get the memo that it was an X-Large dress. The dress flows from the waistline but is supposed to be a snug corset fit on the bust. However, the amount of material given for that region created a four-square effect above and below the bust-line (the girlies who know, know). If you are smaller-chested this dress might be perfect for you!
Lots of compliments!! Was very flattering & comfortable!!

This is a beautiful dress. The material is light and breathable. But, unfortunately, this dress is not flattering on me because of the size of my chest. I am a size 36 DD in a bra. I tried L and XL, and they both failed.
The dress and fabric are both adorable. But I need probably two sizes up from what I normally wear. Sizing chart was not accurate
The material is very rough and scratchy it also is see through and it runs small i used the size chart and fall perfectly in the XL and it wouldnt zip all the way extremely disappointed
I purchased this dress for a photo session and I love it so far. It is a very nice dress that every girl must have.
Super cute dress, just had no support for the girls and was a little restricting on the arms. Material was what you get for the price.

The dress was very cute but not made for anyone with larger than a C cup. Besides having too shallow of a cup the chest area is too wide even with the strings pulled all the way in. The material was decent but the dress is cheaply made and doesn’t include a top hook for the back zipper. Overpriced for the quality you receive.

评论概述: Super pretty dress - not large bust friendly
评论详情: The dress looked great when I tried it on at home, but when I wore it out on my vacation the neckline kept dropping lower - to the point that I kept needing to pull it up, was covering my chest with my hands, and at one point put on a t shirt over. At some point just for the purpose of taking photos I unzipped it from the top a little bit just so it would be a little less tight on my bust - the zipper ended up sliding down, then getting detached in the middle and it fully BROKE while I was out and about. This was my first day wearing the dress.  So while the dress is pretty, I would not recommend it for anyone with a larger chest. For reference I'm a 32G/34H and ordered a size large. So if you're anywhere in that size range (or a sister size) I wouldn't recommend this dress.

Fabric was nice. Sleeves didn’t stay up or down so was impossible to actually wear. Would be cute if it stayed up
